‘Tower of Ōtara’ pulled down over safety concerns https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tower-of-otara-pulled-down-over-safety-concerns/LFAX7V2DKNFQ7ATQ4MFHMRKMKY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tower-of-otara-pulled-down-over-safety-concerns/LFAX7V2DKNFQ7ATQ4MFHMRKMKY/ The wood and corrugated iron structure was adorned with a red bicycle. Wed, 12 Jun 2024 06:02:15 +0000 The ‘Tower of Ōtara’ before it was pulled down by contractors. Photo / Jason Dorday
High Court trial starts in the alleged murder of Bob Kleiman https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/high-court-trial-starts-in-the-alleged-murder-of-bob-kleiman/6R75PSJ4RBAENHDKBYS4ML2G7U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/high-court-trial-starts-in-the-alleged-murder-of-bob-kleiman/6R75PSJ4RBAENHDKBYS4ML2G7U/ Sarah CurtisMurder accused and two alleged accomplices on trial in High Court at Whangarei Wed, 12 Jun 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Ike Wellington Kingi is on trial in the High Court at Whangarei, accused of murdering Bob Kleinman at an Onerahi house, in October 2022. His partner Leonie Farrell and a friend Stacy Jamieson are also on trial for charges alleging they tried to help Kingi escape conviction. Photo / Michael Cunningham
